question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. Bones of Camel - Kalibangan
  2. Houses with doors on the main streets - Lothal
  3. Largest burial site of Indus Valley Civilization - Farmana
    Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Farmana Khas or Daksh Khera is an archaeological site in Rohtak district of Haryana. It is the largest burial site of IVC, with 65 burials, found in India. Evidence of Houses with doors on the main streets has been found at Lothal. Bones of camel were found at Kalibangan.
